author: Brock_the_Builder
title: Great Idea and Design, Awesome, I LOVE it!
review: This clock is incredibly awesome!  The large stormtrooper minifig is amazing.  As soon as I saw this on Lego Shop-at-home, I knew I had to have it.  It is fully pose-able with moving arms, legs, hands, and head.  When you press the head, it activates the clock's backlight.  The backlight is orange.  Pressing on the head also makes the alarm snooze.  The clock is very easy to set and use.  I recommend this clock to anyone who loves Lego minifigs, Star Wars, or both!  It is a MUST HAVE for all Lego fans young and old.  Buy one NOW if you can find it!  Thank you Lego.
